text: I love the elegant design of Miku shoes and lovely colours. The extra width at the front makes them really comfortable and the covered heel gives extra support. I can easily match these shoes with different outfits and wear them for a long time throughout the day.

I loved the design on shoes and the web. The shoes looks casual and suitable for everyday outfit/looks. It comes with few choices of colors as well! The heel cup is quite firm giving a good support for the foot.

Walking made easy with these great shoes. I personally tried shiori & Miku and loved it. Shiori is easy to pair with when you are wearing formal wear. The leather finishing is smooth which makes it suitable for formal events. The rubber soles also provides excellent grip when walking on smooth surfaces. I personally have bunion and the toe box fits nicely to accommodate my bunions too. Miku on the other hand is most comfortable for casual outings. It is fashionable with firm heel cup which is rare to find elsewhere.
I bought sandals . These are perfect. They fit right and comfortable from the first day, especially after molding to your foot. I would buy them again.
Simple and beautiful design to match with my outfit. Something soft, unique and comfortable to wear throughout the day for whole day activity.
